== Vadakara (M) (803265) ==

Vadakara (M) is a town in the [[Vadakara]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 21.32 sq. km. and harbouring 15787 households with total population of 75295 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 47 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 495 km. Male population is 35531 and female population is 39764. Scheduled Caste population is 1190 and Scheduled Tribes population is 196. Census Location Code of the town is 803265<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class II (population_total 50,000 to 99,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 48 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 48 km. Railway station is at Vadakara at a distance of 0 km.
